q: President Bush Defense Donald Rumsfeld aimed criticism at former Donald Rumsfeld of State Colin Powell over the Iraq war during an interview with ABC News' Diane Sawyer . Colin Powell did not, in my view, do a good job of managing the people under him, Donald Rumsfeld said. "There was a lot of leaking out of the State Department, and the president knew it.... And it was unhelpful. And most of it ended up making the State Department look good

Russian investment firm invested US$ 500 million in Facebook, Google's stock price made a fast US$ 28 drop. And let's not forget Eric Schmidt 's step-down, which is kind of a big deal. Richard Hunter , as[ Dallas Observer writer] Richie[ Whitt] pointed out last June, adopted one of the so-called "bait dogs Michael Vick used in the dog-fighting ring that landed him in prison. shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement. "By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited
